headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KERSHNER, BERNARD A.

snippet: KERSHNER--Bernard A.,76, of Avon, CT passed away on May 25, 2016. Beloved husband of Bonnie Kershner and father of three sons, Jason, Aron and Mark, he also leaves behind daughter-in-law, Laura, grandson Wyatt and sister Betty. Born in Brooklyn, he held degrees from Bethany College and Cornell University. A pioneer in the field of ambulatory care, he dedicated his professional life to Healthcare Administration. He loved spending time with his family at their ranch in Colorado. 1/3
